2061.subject: PHYS
2061.descrlong: Introduction to the basic principles of physical science and application of these principles in modern society. Specific topics include nature, properties, and reactions of matter; objects at rest and in motion; energy and power; fluids; heat; light; sound; electricity; and magnetism. Emphasizes conceptual understanding and the scientific process in an active learning environment. For non-science majors. (Offered fall and spring semesters.)
